alert.note: Alert for Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 10:55AM EDT until April 09 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Shawneetown and at J.T. Myers Dam. .Minor flooding continues, but the river will be falling below flood stage this weekend. For the Ohio River...including J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 37.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to hover around 37.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
